channel.title: How do I make requirements to items for non-combat skills?
channel.description:
Such as 70 agility for a crystal bow, 99 herblore for a cape, etc...
Thanks all who helped on my other question, now for this one =)

item.title: How do I make requirements to items for non-combat skills?
item.dc:creator: @Simply_Z3R0 Simply Z3R0
item.description:
@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

narb/pimp/phone…[br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2007, 04:12:10 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Zenzie, post:6, topic:62474”]be4

case 2283: // Agility 1
Agility(“You swing from the rope.”, 3006, 3958, 1, 8*playerLevel[16], 24, 0x323);
break;

case 2283: // Agility 1
Agility(“You swing from the rope.”, 3006, 3958, 1, 50000*playerLevel[16], 24, 0x323);
break;

the fat things are supossed to be the xp’s[/quote]

didn’t think of that, thanks alot - one problem solved, got the exp changed =) now to get item requirements[br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2007, 04:12:56 PM[/size][hr]now I need to know how to add agility requirements to weapons, etc…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make requirements to items for non-combat skills?
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Nirvana you click additional options. From there it’s pretty simple.

He wants to know how to create a requirement for weapons, not what happens when you combine two things.

be4

break;

case 2283: // Agility 1
Agility(“You swing from the rope.”, 3006, 3958, 1, 50000*playerLevel[16], 24, 0x323);

@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

oh ok =)

and on the agility exp…

I’m kinda lost… I don’t see anything involving the Wild agility course just things about monkey bars that require 80 agility…

okay I guess I’ll mess with it and see if I can figure it out =)
thanks for your help


wtf.. I've looked everywhere for the exp for wild agility things and it's nowhere...

Don't know where to add the requirements either, I searched for "Crystal Bow" and could only find it involved in smithing.

item.source: How do I make requirements to items for non-combat skills?

item.title: How do I make requirements to items for non-combat skills?
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Your welcome.

Also for making an item have a requirement to be wielded, you simply set a condition like such below in it.

if ((playerLevel[16] >= 80) {

That would denote that the player needs 80 agility to wield an item or use an object.

Edit: No leave that alone. see that part that says 1000* ? that is the amount of exp it will give. the 16 is Skill ID
Change that 1000* or whatever it is to the desire amount of exp per use.

Read full topic

item.source: How do I make requirements to items for non-combat skills?

item.title: How do I make requirements to items for non-combat skills?
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Edit the glowing red part to change XP levels of agility items. In the skills section especially for agility look for individual cases representing the agility objects.

And edit lines that look like this to change EXP amounts

[glow=red,2,300]addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[16]), 16);[/glow]

Read full topic
